abstract: The Federal Reserve’s monthly survey said the economic expansion was continuing but still sluggish, as housing and construction remained weak.
snippet: The Federal Reserve’s monthly survey said the economic expansion was continuing but still sluggish, as housing and construction remained weak.
lead_paragraph: Economic activity in the United States has continued to expand at a modest pace, although some areas, including housing, construction and the labor market, remain weak, the Federal Reserve said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Economic Activity Is Expanding Modestly, the Federal Reserve Says
headline.print_headline: Economic Activity Is Expanding Modestly, the Federal Reserve Says
